about_the_game:
Chasing Cassidy is a 3D first person narratively driven adventure game where you play as David Williams, a writer from England who has come in search of infamous outlaw Cassidy Miller in the West. Facing a country unfamiliar to him and criminals that could end his life in a second, David's conversational skills maybe his key to survival or lead him to an early grave.

EXPLORE THE WEST

Find what mysteries and people wait for you as you travel across the two unique towns of Stampton and Robertsville. Travel across the areas with speed on horse back or take your time on foot and immerse yourself in the local surroundings and atmosphere.

INTRODUCE YOURSELF TO THE LOCALS

Meet the highly detailed and unique characters that may help you or may target you. Make choices that will effect different character's outcomes and futures or that may even change your own. 

WILL YOU FIND HIM OR WILL HE FIND YOU?

Your choices will influence the world around you and how you end up meeting with Cassidy. So will you act with kindness and justice in mind or become just like the outlaws and criminals that you plan to write about, the choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes: Disclaimer: This game includes moderate violent scenes including but not limited to suicide, hanging and violence against women.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, Mac Mini late 2012 and newer; Mac Pro late 2013 and newer; MacBook 2015 and newer
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630+ (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
